Package org.cougaar.core.adaptivity

This package contains the Cougaar adaptivity engine and client APIs.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Condition A Condition holds a value that the AdaptivityEngine or PolicyManager uses for selecting Plays or OperatingModePolicys.
OperatingMode A control input for a component (for example, a plugin).
OperatingModeListener  
PolicyManager The role of a Policy Manager is to - Subscribe to particular policy types - Expand them to other lower-level policies - Where appropriate, direct these sub-policies to other components - Manage the conflicts among policies - Manage the enforcement of policy goals
 

Class Summary
AdaptivityEngine Sets OperatingModes for components based on plays in the playbook and current conditions.
AEViewerServlet Servlet to view adaptivity objects and edit operating mode policies
ArithmeticOperator Defines constants for operators used for describing and interpreting relations between policy components.
BooleanOperator Defines boolean operator constants.
ComparableHelper Helper methods for dealing with Comparable values.
ConditionServiceProvider This Plugin serves as an ConditionServiceProvider.
ConstrainingClause Holds a parsed expression for testing the values of Conditions.
ConstraintOperator Defines constants for operators used for describing and interpreting relations between policy components.
ConstraintOpValue A phrase fragment used to express a boolean comparison and a set of valid values to compare against.
ConstraintPhrase A phrase used to express a boolean comparison between a string standing in for condition data or an operating mode and a Object holding the value and a set of valid values
CPURemoteTestPlugin A plugin to exercise the Relay mechanism by setting a RelayedOperatingMode that is targeted to the Provider agent.
CPUTestPlugin  
InterAgentCondition The Condition part of a remotely-controlled Condition.
InterAgentOperatingMode A remotely-controlled Condition.
InterAgentOperatingModePolicy A remotely-controlled OperatingModePolicy.
LateOperatingModePlugin  
MetricsCondition  
MetricsCondition.Boolean  
MetricsCondition.Default  
MetricsCondition.Double  
MetricsCondition.Integer  
MetricsCondition.Long  
MetricsCondition.String  
MetricsTestPlugin  
OMCBase The base class for OperatingMode and Condition implementations.
OMCPoint Holds a range specification for an operating mode or condition having a single value.
OMCRange Holds a range specification for an operating mode or condition value.
OMCRangeList  
OMCThruRange Holds a range specification for an operating mode or condition value expressed as a closed interval (min and max are in the range).
OMCToRange Holds a range specification for an operating mode or condition value expressed as an half-open interval (min is included, but max is not).
OperatingModeCondition  
OperatingModeImpl An implementation of the most common, simple OperatingMode.
OperatingModePolicy OperatingModePolicy specifies constraints on values of Operating modes.
OperatingModePolicyManager A PolicyManager that handles OperatingModePolicies For now, it listens for OperatingModePolicies and uses the PlaybookConstrainService to constrain the playbook with the OMPolicies.
OperatingModeServiceProvider This Plugin serves as an OperatingModeServiceProvider.
Operator Defines boolean operator constants.
Parser Parser for plays to be stored in a Playbook.
Play The Play determines what values to apply to a circumstance.
PlayBase Base class for Plays and OperatingModePolicies.
Playbook A container for Plays providing operations to constrain plays with OperatingModePolicys.
PlaybookManager A container for the active Plays.
PlayHelper Helper class for computing OperatingModes from plays and Conditions
PolicyInjectorPlugin Plugin that reads OperatingModePolicies from files and publishes them to the blackboard
PolicyKernel  
PolicyRemoteTestPlugin Test plugin that reads policies from a file, creates InterAgentOperatingModePolicies and alternately forwards the policy to another agent and revokes the policy.
PolicyTestPlugin Test plugin that alternately constrains and unconstrains the playbook with an operating mode policy it read froma file
SensorCondition A class to hold a sensor condition.
ServiceUserPluginBase Convenience base class for plugins that need to acquire services that may not be immediately available when first started.
ThreatconTestPlugin  
TransferRequest published to the blackboard by a plugin in order to send an object to a destination by name This will be picked up by a logic provider which will create a real message and call the Message Transport Service to send it.
 

Exception Summary
MissingConditionException  
 

Package org.cougaar.core.adaptivity Description

This package contains the Cougaar adaptivity engine and client APIs.

Client plugins can register sensors (Conditions) and control "knobs" (OperatingModes) with the adaptivity engine. The adaptivity engine plugin uses policy and a rule file (Playbook) to change the control settings, adapting the configuration to match the sensor data.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
